snippet.title: [CLIP]: Rook & Wren - The aviation sustainability landscape (Amber Harrison)
snippet.description:
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/rebootaviation/
Our website: https://rebootaviation.com/

About Amber:

Amber helps businesses navigate the right approach for their sustainability, corporate social responsibility (CSR) and communications needs. Previously she was Director, CSR & Sustainability, at SITA, a global IT and telecommunications provider to the air transport industry.

She was responsible for the development and implementation of the global sustainability strategy, and creation of their ‘carbon neutral by 2022’ initiative. It included the first company-wide carbon footprint assessment, and execution of a verified carbon offset programme supporting projects in Borneo, India, Guatemala and East Africa.

Amber also spearheaded the implementation of an ISO 14001:2015 certified global environmental management system, capturing a reduction in operational emissions of 41% since 2011.
